name: Ragdoll: Fall Simulator
description:
Ragdoll is fun!

In this game, you can launch your character anywhere, watching as his limbs dangle and hit all the obstacles.


Goals? Tasks? Meaning?

Not. Nothing limits you in the game. Choose any level and do what you want!

Features

  • Everything is dynamic! Even the game menu :D
  • Realistic collision simulation
  • Many cool levels
  • Dynamic objects
  • Random characters
  • Detailed physics settings [optional]
  • Freedom to experiment

Feel free to turn on any level and try it!
